message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I would like to counteroffer at $15000.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer of $15000, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $18000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Thank you for considering my previous counteroffer, Alice. I would like to propose a new counteroffer at $16000.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not sure I'm willing to go as low as $16000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again at $17500. Let's see if we can meet in the middle this time.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to consider $17000 as my counteroffer.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal! I'm willing to meet you at $17000, but I'm still hoping to get a bit more. I'll make one more concession at $18500. Let's see if we can make it work this time.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $17250.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go much higher than $17250, but I'm willing to meet you there. I'll sell the product to you for $17500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Let's finalize the deal!
